title: HoP 089 - On the Horizon - Plotinus on the Soul
itunes:title: HoP 089 - On the Horizon - Plotinus on the Soul
description: For Plotinus, Soul is on the border between the physical and intelligible realms. Can he convince us to identify ourselves with its highest part?
